column4: open a terminal, and type in ls /media/cdrom0, open a terminal, and type in ls /media/cdrom1
one
sounds like a feature. Whre are you looking for this option?
when I put the dvd in the drive an icon comes on the desktop
I never saw an option to play the dvd in there. When inserted, the dvds should start a media player program.
it's not a movie, it's a dvd disk with mp3's on it
any files?
what?
did you do what I told you?
^ that will tell y ou if there are files on the dvd.

how many drives do you have?
ok, well, is there a dvd icon on your desktop?
yeah
is the disc rw?
if the dvd is rw, then 100%iits empty. If it is r, 99% its empty.

show's all the files
